name: Harpoona Matata
description:
Set sail in search of your home. Operate your ship, steer it, and use your harpoon weapons to fend off sharks. Along the way, you'll meet some interesting people and you'll be pestered by a seagull. What more could one wish for?

Made for Global Game Jam 2019!

Partnered with Zack, Steve, Mike, PJ, and Battlerock's very own -- Troy!
